description: Number of i such that d(i)>d(i-1), where Sum{d(i)*9^i: i=0,1,....,m} is base 9 representation of n.
maple: A037824 := proc(n)    a := 0 ;    dgs := convert(n,base,9);    for i from 2 to nops(dgs) do        if op(i,dgs)>op(i-1,dgs) then            a := a+1 ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 16 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Sign in name corrected. - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 16 2015
